page.title: 14 CLOTHES IN INKPEN 1985
page.content: General:- Many people wear wellington boots in Inkpen - even in the summer - because we have a lot of woods which make it shady and damp. Community Nurse:- She wears a French, navy dress and a navy blue coat with black shoes and blue tights. Other nurses wear green or yellow dresses according to their grade. Materials used for the clothes would include polyester and cotton. Village Shop Workers:- Women wear dresses or a jumpers and trousers. The men wear a jumper and trousers. Milkman:- He wears jeans and a jumper or T-shirt. Children at School:- Girls wear a grey dress, white blouse, red tie and grey cardigan in the winter and a red and white check dress in the summer. Boys wear grey trousers, grey or white shirt, red tie and a grey pullover.
